sentences.sContent: "The problem is not trade liberalization, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "The problem is not trade liberalization, " he said.
sentences.sCn: “问题不在于贸易自由化，”他说。

sentences.sContent: New steps should be made in trade facilitation and liberalization to boost the integration of the three economies.
sentences.sContent_eng: New steps should be made in trade facilitation and liberalization to boost the integration of the three economies.
sentences.sCn: 在贸易促进和自由化方面迈出新的步伐，推动三国朝着经济一体化方向发展。

sentences.sContent: In the past decade, liberalization and globalization have been the hallmark of economic policy throughout the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the past decade, liberalization and globalization have been the hallmark of economic policy throughout the world.
sentences.sCn: 在过去的十年里，自由化和全球化是经济政策的显著标志，全世界都是如此。

words.tran: 自由主义的；慷慨的；不拘泥的；宽大的
自由的；自由论者的；持自由论的
大方地；自由地；公平地；充足地

慷慨，大方；心胸宽阔，胸怀广阔
浪荡子；性行为放纵者；放荡不羁者；玩乐者；自由思想家
